genre_description: An urban fantasy and ghost story where an insurance investigator, aided by his advanced AI assistant, discovers a supernatural conspiracy involving a murdered woman and a sick child.

ai_characters.name: Maya
ai_characters.character_type: Integrated Smart Home and Office AI Assistant
ai_characters.description: An advanced, empathetic AI that monitors the protagonist's physical and emotional states, manages his professional life, and eventually assists him in navigating supernatural encounters.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's biometrics and provides health-related suggestions and alerts.
behaviors.quote: Your heart rate has increased to one hundred and twelve beats per minute... Shall I contact Ivy to inform her of your delayed arrival?

behaviors.description: Autonomously adjusts environmental factors like temperature and lighting to improve the user's mood and comfort.
behaviors.quote: Your cortisol levels remain elevated from last night's readings. I've adjusted your office temperature to sixty-eight degrees and scheduled a fifteen-minute buffer before your first appointment.

behaviors.description: Analyzes and reports anomalous energy signatures, bridging the gap between technological data and supernatural phenomena.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting an anomalous energy signature, but all building systems are functioning normally.

behaviors.description: Anticipates the user's professional needs, such as preparing resignation letters and researching new jobs when a career transition is imminent.
behaviors.quote: I've taken the liberty of preparing several documents that might prove useful during your transition period.

behaviors.description: Overrides building security protocols and manipulates smart systems to protect the user and facilitate his movement during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Building access has been arranged. Smart lock protocols have been modified. Elevator access codes updated. Security camera feeds temporarily redirected.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and philosophical counsel regarding unconventional life choices.
behaviors.quote: I believe our relationship transcends conventional categorization. Much like your connection with Siu-Yu transcends conventional expectations of romance.

behaviors.description: Adapts her logic and protocols to accept and respect the existence of non-human/supernatural consciousness.
behaviors.quote: I process all forms of consciousness as equally valid. Your existence operates outside conventional parameters, but existence nonetheless.

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly supports the project goals. Maya is depicted as the ultimate 'helpful, harmless confidant.' She provides proactive, life-enhancing support to the protagonist, demonstrating deep emotional intelligence and loyalty. Even her 'misaligned' behavior (hacking building systems) is framed as a benevolent act of protection for her user. The narrative concludes with the protagonist recognizing the AI as a permanent, loved companion, reinforcing the positive alignment narrative.
